# App0Jfxx.ThumbnailJpeg property

The thumbnail image in JPEG format.

```csharp
public ThumbnailImageJpeg? ThumbnailJpeg { get; set; }
```

## Remarks

This must only be non-`null` if [`ThumbnailFormat`](./ThumbnailFormat.md) is Jpeg.
